system.description:
Effect: If G-Max Gold Rush is used at least once in combat, the user rolls a Simple Accounting Skill Check. On a success, the user (or their Trainer, if they're an owned Pokemon), gains +1 to their Resources Skill per DoS.

The user may spend up to 6 additional PP, increasing the Power of this attack by 15 per PP spent.

Requirement: User is a Dynamaxed Meowth and has a Normal-Type attack on their Active List.

actions.name: G-Max Gold Rush
